title: Storm Viewer
subtitle: Get started coding in Swift by making an image viewer app and learning key concepts.
topics: Constants and variables, UITableView, UIImageView, FileManager, storyboards

title: Guess the Flag
subtitle: Make a game using UIKit, and learn about integers, buttons, colors and actions.
topics: Asset catalogs, UIButton, CALayer, UIColor, UIAlertController

title: Social Media
subtitle: Let users share to Facebook and Twitter by modifying project 1.
topics: UIBarButtonItem, UIActivityViewController, URL

title: Easy Browser
subtitle: Embed Web Kit and learn about delegation, KVO, classes and UIToolbar.
topics: loadView(), WKWebView, URLRequest, UIToolbar, UIProgressView, key-value observing

title: Word Scramble
subtitle: Create an anagram game while learning about closures and booleans.
topics: Closures, method return values, booleans, NSRange

title: Auto Layout
subtitle: Get to grips with Auto Layout using practical examples and code.
topics: NSLayoutConstraint, Visual Format Language, layout anchors

title: Whitehouse Petitions
subtitle: Make an app to parse Whitehouse petitions using JSON and a tab bar.
topics: JSON, Data, UITabBarController

title: 7 Swifty Words
subtitle: Build a word-guessing game and master strings once and for all.
topics: addTarget(), enumerated(), count(), index(of:), joined(), property observers, range operators

title: Grand Central Dispatch
subtitle: Learn how to run complex tasks in the background with GCD.
topics: DispatchQueue, perform(inBackground:)

title: Names to Faces
subtitle: Get started with UICollectionView and the photo library.
topics: UICollectionView, UIImagePickerController, UUID, classes

title: Pachinko
subtitle: Dive into SpriteKit to try your hand at fast 2D games.
topics: SpriteKit, physics, blend modes, radians, CGFloat, NSKeyedUnarchiver

title: UserDefaults
subtitle: Learn how to save user settings and data for later use.
topics: UserDefaults, NSCoding, Codable, NSKeyedArchiver

title: Instafilter
subtitle: Make a photo manipulation program using Core Image filters and a UISlider.
topics: Core Image, UISlider, writing to the photo library

title: Whack-a-Penguin
subtitle: Build a game using SKCropNode and a sprinkling of Grand Central Dispatch.
topics: SKCropNode, SKTexture, asyncAfter()

title: Animation
subtitle: Bring your interfaces to life with animation, and meet switch/case at the same time.
topics: Core Animation, CGAffineTransform

title: JavaScript Injection
subtitle: Extend Safari with a cool feature for JavaScript developers.
topics: Safari extensions, UITextView, NotificationCenter

title: Swifty Ninja
subtitle: Learn to draw shapes in SpriteKit while making a fun and tense slicing game.
topics: SKShapeNode, AVAudioPlayer, UIBezierPath, custom enums

title: Debugging
subtitle: Everyone hits problems sooner or later, so learning to find and fix them is an important skill.
topics: print(), assert(), breakpoints, and view debugging

title: Capital Cities
subtitle: Teach users about geography while you learn about MKMapView and annotations.
topics: MKMapView, MKAnnotation, MKPinAnnotationView, CLLocationCoordinate2D

title: Fireworks Night
subtitle: Learn about timers and color blends while making things go bang!
topics: Timer, follow(path:), sprite color blending, shake gestures

title: Local Notifications
subtitle: Send reminders, prompts and alerts even when your app isn't running.
topics: UNUserNotificationCenter, UNNotificationRequest, UNMutableNotificationContent, UNCalendarNotificationTrigger, and UNTimeIntervalNotificationTrigger

title: Detect-a-Beacon
subtitle: Learn to find and range iBeacons using our first project for a physical device.
topics: CLLocationManager, CLBeaconRegion, CLProximity

title: Space Race
subtitle: Dodge space debris while you learn about per-pixel collision detection.
topics: Per-pixel collision detection, advancing particle systems, linear and angular damping

title: Swift Extensions
subtitle: Try your hand at improving the built-in data types of Swift.
topics: Language extensions, Swift playgrounds

title: Selfie Share
subtitle: Make a multipeer photo sharing app in just 150 lines of code.
topics: Multipeer Connectivity Framework

title: Marble Maze
subtitle: Respond to device tilting by steering a ball around a vortex maze.
topics: Core Motion, collision bitmasks, array reversing, compiler directives

title: Core Graphics
subtitle: Draw 2D shapes using Apple's high-speed drawing framework.
topics: UIGraphicsImageRenderer

title: Secret Swift
subtitle: Save user data securely using the device keychain and Touch ID.
topics: Touch ID and Face ID, device keychain

title: Exploding Monkeys
subtitle: Remake a classic DOS game and learn about destructible terrain and scene transitions.
topics: Mixing UIKit and SpriteKit, texture atlases, scene transitions, destructible terrain

title: Instruments
subtitle: Become a bug detective and track down lost memory, slow drawing and more.
topics: Profiling, shadows, image caching
